title: How many chapters are in Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone? - Quora
tags: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone (book)

response.answer_text: There are total 17 chapters in Harry Potter and The Sorcerer’s Stone.  Here They Are:- The Boy Who LivedThe Vanishing GlassThe Letters From No OneThe Keeper of the KeysDiagon AlleyThe Journey From Platform Nine and Three QuartersThe Sorting HatThe Potions MasterThe Midnight DuelHallowe’enQuidditchThe Mirror of ErisedNicolas FlamelNorbert the Norwegian RidgebackThe Forbidden ForestThrough the TrapdoorThe Man With Two FacesHeRe We ArE!
